prompts: Create a flying-type Pokemon with sleek silver feathers and sharp red wings.
I want a bird-like creature that has metallic colors and is known for its speed.
Generate a steel-type Pokemon that showcases a blend of gray and red hues.
Make an avian Pokemon with a strong body shape and a fierce appearance.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in mountainous areas and has a unique wing design.
Design a creature that embodies the essence of steel and flight, with sharp features.
Give me a Pokemon that has a combination of agility and durability in its look.
